title: Bug 115960: Datetime values retrieved from table show different format in dynamic text item and data/text item
OB: Datetime values retrieved from the table exhibit varying formats when displayed in dynamic text items and data/text items.
EB: Datetime values should consistently maintain the same format when retrieved from the table, whether displayed in dynamic text items or data/text items.
SR:
To reproduce: 
1. Retrieve datetime values from the table.
2. Display these values in both dynamic text items and data/text items.
